languages.text: "Я не вижу здесь томов Лекс Империалис — значит, ты презрела букву закона, что исходит от самого Императора и Святой Терры, и судишь, полагаясь лишь на себя. Насколько же ты возгордилась, Инцендия?"

"I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"
languages.original_text: "Я не вижу здесь томов Лекс Империалис — значит, ты презрела букву закона, что исходит от самого Императора и Святой Терры, и судишь, полагаясь лишь на себя. Насколько же ты возгордилась, Инцендия?"

"I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"

languages.text: « Je ne vois pas le moindre tome de la Lex Imperialis à proximité, ce qui signifie que vous avez tourné le dos à la loi de l'Empereur et de la Sainte Terra. Ce jugement n'est que le vôtre. Avez-vous succombé à l'orgueil, Incendia ? »
languages.original_text: "I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois pas le moindre tome de la Lex Imperialis à proximité, ce qui signifie que vous avez tourné le dos à la loi de l'Empereur et de la Sainte Terra. Ce jugement n'est que le vôtre. Avez-vous succombé à l'orgueil, Incendia ? »

languages.text: 「ここにはレックス・インペリアの本が一冊も見当たらない。すなわち、君は皇帝陛下の法、聖なる地球の法文をも退け、自らの裁きを下しているということだ。インセンディアよ、その傲慢の果てに、君はどれほど堕ちたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"

traits.locale_text: 「ここにはレックス・インペリアの本が一冊も見当たらない。すなわち、君は皇帝陛下の法、聖なる地球の法文をも退け、自らの裁きを下しているということだ。インセンディアよ、その傲慢の果てに、君はどれほど堕ちたんだ？」

languages.text: "Burada tek bir Lex İmperialis kitabı dahi göremiyorum. Bu İmparator'un Yasası ve Kutsal Terra'nın kelamlarını hiçe saydığın anlamına gelir. Keyfince yargıda bulunuyorsun. Kibrin seni ne kadar zehirledi İncendia?"
languages.original_text: "I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"

traits.locale_text: "Burada tek bir Lex İmperialis kitabı dahi göremiyorum. Bu İmparator'un Yasası ve Kutsal Terra'nın kelamlarını hiçe saydığın anlamına gelir. Keyfince yargıda bulunuyorsun. Kibrin seni ne kadar zehirledi İncendia?"

languages.text: «No veo ni un tomo de la Lex Imperialis aquí, lo que significa que rechaza el texto de la Ley del Emperador y de la Sagrada Terra. Su juicio es solo suyo. ¿Cómo deja que su arrogancia la haga caer tan bajo, Incendia?».
languages.original_text: "I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"

traits.locale_text: «No veo ni un tomo de la Lex Imperialis aquí, lo que significa que rechaza el texto de la Ley del Emperador y de la Sagrada Terra. Su juicio es solo suyo. ¿Cómo deja que su arrogancia la haga caer tan bajo, Incendia?».

languages.text: “我在这里没看到一本关于帝国律法的书，这意味着你完全纵容你自己的判断，甚至凌驾于神圣泰拉与帝皇亲自颁布的律法之上。你怎么会狂妄自大到这种地步，因森蒂娅？”
languages.original_text: "I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"

traits.locale_text: “我在这里没看到一本关于帝国律法的书，这意味着你完全纵容你自己的判断，甚至凌驾于神圣泰拉与帝皇亲自颁布的律法之上。你怎么会狂妄自大到这种地步，因森蒂娅？”

languages.text: "Ich sehe hier nicht einen Band des Lex Imperia. Das heißt, Ihr habt das Gesetz des Imperators und des Heiligen Terra verschmäht ... Ihr steht mit Eurem Urteil also allein. Wie tief seid Ihr in Eurer Hybris gesunken, Incendia?"
languages.original_text: "I do not see a single tome of the Lex Imperialis in this place, which means that you have spurned the letter of the Emperor's Law and that of Holy Terra — your judgement is your own. How far have you fallen in your hubris, Incendia?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe hier nicht einen Band des Lex Imperia. Das heißt, Ihr habt das Gesetz des Imperators und des Heiligen Terra verschmäht ... Ihr steht mit Eurem Urteil also allein. Wie tief seid Ihr in Eurer Hybris gesunken, Incendia?"
